tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData (
	driver_id UUID,
	date DATE,
	distance_traveled FLOAT,
	speed_avg FLOAT,
	acceleration_max FLOAT,
	acceleration_min FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE driving_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id UUID REFERENCES drivers(driver_id),
  record_date DATE,
  distance_traveled INT,
  average_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE machine_learning_data (
  data_id UUID,
  driver_id UUID,
  throttle FLOAT,
  steering_angle FLOAT,
  brake_pressure FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DriverBehaviorData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
  acceleration FLOAT NOT NULL,
  speed FLOAT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE NavigationData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT NOT NULL,
  destination TEXT NOT NULL,
  route TEXT NOT NULL,
  distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
  temperature INT NOT NULL,
  humidity INT NOT NULL,
  precipitation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trip_data (
    trip_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_id UUID,
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance_km FLOAT,
    trip_duration_mins INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES driver_info(driver_id)
);

CREATE TABLE acceleration_data (
    acceleration_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_id UUID,
    acceleration_value FLOAT,
    acceleration_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trip_data(trip_id)
);

CREATE TABLE speed_data (
    speed_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_id UUID,
    speed_value FLOAT,
    speed_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trip_data(trip_id)
);

CREATE TABLE braking_data (
    braking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_id UUID,
    braking_force FLOAT,
    braking_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trip_data(trip_id)
);
